gathergrpcAdminUser.description: User data for an Adminstrative User.

gathergrpcAdminUserListResponse.description:
Wrapper message to provide a response in the form of
a container of multiple AdminUser objects.

gathergrpcAdminUserRequest.description:
AdminUserRequest - wrapper for passing AdminUser
data as a request to the service.

gathergrpcAdminUserResponse.description:
AdminUserResponse - wrapper for passing AdminUser
data as a response from the service.

gathergrpcIngestionDictionary.description: Wrapper fos the object that stores the available values of the metrics that may be ingested by ADH.

gathergrpcIngestionDictionaryData.description: Stores the available values of the metrics that may be ingested by ADH.

gathergrpcLinks.description:
Links technically allow any valid json string as a key,
we obviously can't do this, so we have to stick to the following.

gathergrpcMonitoredObject.description:
MonitoredObject - describes a unique device/object which is reporting 
data from the network.

gathergrpcMonitoredObjectCountByDomainRe.description:
Provides options to configure how the GetMonitoredObjectToDomainMap API will return its results.
byCount: true will return a count of Monitored Objects, false will return a set of MonitoredObject IDs.
domainSet: set of Domain IDs to filter the request by.

gathergrpcMonitoredObjectListResponse.description:
MonitoredObjectListResponse - Wrapper for requests which return a list of MonitoredObjects 
scoped to a single Tenant.

gathergrpcMonitoredObjectRequest.description:
MonitoredObjectRequest - Wrapper for requests involving a MonitoredObject that are 
scoped to a single Tenant.

gathergrpcMonitoredObjectResponse.description:
MonitoredObjectRequest - Wrapper for responses involving a MonitoredObject that are 
scoped to a single Tenant.

gathergrpcTenantDescriptor.description:
Provides the metadata of a Tenant. This information is used to 
idetify/describe a full Tenant entity.

gathergrpcTenantDescriptorListResponse.description:
Wrapper message to provide a response in the form of
a container of multiple TenantDescriptor objects.

gathergrpcTenantDescriptorRequest.description:
TenantDescriptorRequest - wrapper for passing TenantDescriptor
data as a request to the service.

gathergrpcTenantDescriptorResponse.description:
TenantDescriptorResponse - wrapper for passing TenantDescriptor
data as a response from the service.

gathergrpcTenantDomain.description: TenantDomain - model for a Domain for a single Tenant.

gathergrpcTenantDomainListResponse.description:
TenantDomainListResponse - a wrapper for a list of TenantDomain objects that 
are returned as a response to a request..

gathergrpcTenantDomainRequest.title: TenantDomainRequest - wrapper for requests that involve a Tenant Domain

gathergrpcTenantDomainResponse.title: TenantDomainResponse - wrapper for responses that involve a Tenant Domain

gathergrpcTenantIngestionProfile.description:
TenantIngestionProfile - model for the singleton object that 
governs what data is displayed for a Tenant.

gathergrpcTenantIngestionProfileRequest.title:
TenantIngestionProfileRequest - wrapper for requests that involve the
Tenant Ingestion Profile

gathergrpcTenantIngestionProfileResponse.description:
TenantIngestionProfileResponse - wrapper to provide a Tenant Ingestion Profile
in a response.

gathergrpcTenantThresholdProfileRequest.title:
TenantThresholdProfileRequest - wrapper for requests that involve the
Tenant Threshold Profile

gathergrpcTenantThresholdProfileResponse.description:
TenantIngestionProfileResponse - wrapper to provide a Tenant Ingestion Profile
in a response.

gathergrpcTenantUserListResponse.description:
TenantUserListResponse - a wrapper to handle requests that return a
list of TenantUser objects.

gathergrpcTenantUserRequest.description:
TenantUserRequest - wrapper for requests that involve a User that
is scoped to a single Tenant.

gathergrpcTenantUserResponse.description:
TenantUserResponse - wrapper for responses to requests that involve a User that
is scoped to a single Tenant.

type_url.description:
A URL/resource name whose content describes the type of the
serialized protocol buffer message.

For URLs which use the scheme `http`, `https`, or no scheme, the
following restrictions and interpretations apply:

* If no scheme is provided, `https` is assumed.
* The last segment of the URL's path must represent the fully
  qualified name of the type (as in `path/google.protobuf.Duration`).
  The name should be in a canonical form (e.g., leading "." is
  not accepted).
* An HTTP GET on the URL must yield a [google.protobuf.Type][]
  value in binary format, or produce an error.
* Applications are allowed to cache lookup results based on the
  URL, or have them precompiled into a binary to avoid any
  lookup. Therefore, binary compatibility needs to be preserved
  on changes to types. (Use versioned type names to manage
  breaking changes.)

Schemes other than `http`, `https` (or the empty scheme) might be
used with implementation specific semantics.

value.description: Must be a valid serialized protocol buffer of the above specified type.
